nodes.text: Return of the Jedi is a canon young-readers adaptation of the original trilogy film Star Wars: Episode VI Return of the Jedi. It was written by Geof Smith and published by Golden Books on July 28, 2015.
Just in time for the release of Star Wars: Episode VII The Force Awakens…the first six Star Wars films are finally retold in Little Golden Books!

The epic space saga, Star Wars: Return of the Jedi, is finally retold in the iconic Little Golden Book format! Luke Skywalker heads a mission to rescue Han Solo from the clutches of Jabba the Hutt, and faces Darth Vader one last time. Featuring stunning retro illustrations, this book is perfect for Star Wars—and Little Golden Book—fans of all ages!
